product_name: Swix VR55 Silver/Violet Fluorinated Hard Kick Wax - 45g
long_description: Tested and used at World Cup competitions, the Swix VR55 silver/violet fluorinated hard kick wax is designed for slightly moist new snow around freezing and for older, transformed snow below freezing.
short_description: Tested and used at World Cup competitions, the Swix VR55 silver/violet fluorinated hard kick wax is designed for slightly moist new snow around freezing and for older, transformed snow below freezing.
